SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.help.search

Interface ISearchScope

public interface ISearchScope
The generic search scope object. This is a tagging interface since each search engine is expected to have its own non-overlapping set of scopes that users can include in or exclude from the search. Clients are expected to create scope objects that implement this interface and pass them to the search engine.
Since:
3.1
